reuters.title: FORTUNE SAVINGS TO BUY FINANCIAL <FSSL> BRANCH
reuters.body: <Fortune Savings Bank> said it agreed to buy the deposits and assume the leasehold of a Financial Security Savings and Loan Association <FSSL> branch here. Terms of the agreement were not disclosed. Fortune said the agreement is subject to regulatory approval. It also said that if the transaction is approved, Financial would generate a profit on the sale. Reuter 
